title: A Grimm & Dirty Omnibus: Twelve Erotic Fairy Tales
description: Note: Paperback includes all 18 Grimm & Dirty Tales. (Six were written by reader request after the initial publication of the Omnibus ebook, which has only the first twelve.)Creative erotic retellings of the European folktales once collected by the Bros Grimm: The Juniper Tree, Lily and the Lion (Beauty & the Beast), The Wedding of Mrs. Fox, The White Snake, Chanticleer & Partlet, Rapunzel, Briar Rose (Sleeping Beauty), The Dog and the Sparrow, The Pink, Clever Elsie, The Blue Light, and The Frog Prince Not for children. Lots of dirty sex.Approx 25,000 words.
author: A. Violet End
